title: Provides for the review of the criminal history information of prospective residents of nursing homes
summary: Provides for the review of the criminal history information of prospective residents of nursing homes by the department of health to determine whether such resident has a prior sex offense conviction or a recent completion of the sentence for a criminal conviction; in any such case information on such conviction shall be disclosed to the nursing home.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the executive law, in relation to the review of criminal history information concerning prospective residents of nursing homes
